item.title: VS Code loses Go autocompletion on Linux
item.description: On my Linux, just after upgrading Go to version 1.9, I lost autompletion functionality in VS Code. :vscode_completion_not_working This tip did not work for me. So let’s try to debug it. First, we close the auto-completion server (see github.com/nsf/gocode ) : gocode close killall gocode Then we relaunch it as a server in debug mode inside a console : gocode -debug -s So now, we can see what’s happening. OK, time to try an auto-completion inside VS Code.
